Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD; 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Mut amulet
Description: Amulet representing the goddess Mut, in a walking position, with the arms close to the body. She is dressed in a long close-fitting tunic and on her head is the double crown of Upper Egypt and Lower Egypt. The figure leans against a pillar with hieroglyphic inscription.
